Organizing an outing event
1  January,  2021
Organizing an outing event in celebration of the International Day of Persons with Disabilities, supported and sponsored by Rasan Sports Company. The social-recreational event aimed at raising societal awareness about disability issues through commemorating the International Day of Persons with Disabilities and showcasing their abilities to the community.
